question: 再び
sourceMnemonic: This is the adverb version of <ja>再</ja>, so it shares the meaning <vocabulary>again</vocabulary> and also has the meaning <vocabulary>once again</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: <vocabulary>Once again</vocabulary>, you put a <reading>footer</reading> in your note because you can't remember the reading to this word because the mnemonic is so bad (sorry!).
